snippet: Documentarians sometimes face a challenge: developing a relationship with the subject while still maintaining some distance.
abstract: Documentarians sometimes face a challenge of balancing the development of a relationship with their subject with maintaining some distance; Bart Layton faced such challenges while filming his documentary The Imposter.
lead_paragraph: Documentarians sometimes face a challenge: developing a relationship with the subject while still maintaining some distance.
